name: McCpie
tagline: A simple easy to use pie chart for Java swing.
body:
### Welcome to the McCPie home page
McCPie is a pie chart library for Java Swing. It is a simple free alternative to some other pie chart systems out there.
Feel free to download or contribute to the McCPie project.

### Authors and Contributors
Daniel McCarthy(@nibblebits)


### Support or Contact
Daniel McCarthy : dansblackberry2@hotmail.co.uk
